page.title: 08Shopping in Stamford Bridge
page.content: People in the village use the shops in Stamford Bridge but also they go into York, Leeds and Pocklington for their main shopping.Our shops sell groeries, papers and hardware.We also have a clothes shop but the choice is limited .Longbottom's sells sweets, books and petrol.Reynard's garage supplies the coaches for our school trips.Mr Holliday also has a garage. He sells petrol and repairs cars.The Estate Agent helps people buy and sell houses.Mr Rutherford sells electrical goods such as music centres, televisions, video recorders and Micro_wave ovens.We have a cafe and a tea shop for visitors and the Corn Mill Restaurant. The post office sells stamps and envelopes and weighs your parcels.Letter collections are twice daily,but only 1 on Saturday.We have our own automatic telephone exchange.
